description: Number of iterations of unitary totient function (A047994) required to reach 1 from n.
comments: a(A003271(n)) = n and a(m) <> n for m < A003271(n). [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 17 2011]
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
maple: A049865 := proc(n)    if n = 1 then        0 ;    else        1+procname( A047994(n)) ;    end if;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, May 02 2013
mathematica: uphi[n_] := (f = FactorInteger[n]; Times @@ (f[[All, 1]]^f[[All, 2]] - 1)); uphi[n_ /; n <= 1] = 1; a[n_] := (k = 0; FixedPoint[ (k++; uphi[#]) & , n]; k-1); Table[a[n], {n, 1, 120}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jan 20 2012 *)
prog: (Haskell)a049865 n = length $ takeWhile (> 1) $ iterate a047994 na049865_list = map a049865 [1..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 17 2011
author: _David W. Wilson_
